embed.title: Farming Formtion
embed.description: Tips on getting 3-star wins in level 8000.

fields.name: Tips
fields.value:
• Put Hohenheim on the side, and protect him with two Pilgrims.
• Use troops that help you win with speed and power: Undead Soldier, Peltasts, Taurus Witcher, Ballista, and Priest Mage.
• Avoid speed-control units: Dark Witch, Ice Mage, and Frost Archers.
• Avoid using single-load tank units (i.e. Stone Golem) except for crowd control (i.e. Witchraft Totem).
• Minimize the uses of sacrificial troops (Goblikazes and Voodoo Dolls).
• Use one or two Necromancer to ensure 50% troops survival rate.

footer.text: Use `{PREFIX}formation leveling` for tips about passing levels before level 8000.
